txt.en: Add the component to the Kolos Throk socket
Part of the device seems to be missing
The Kolos Throk socket can be found somewhere in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should take the seal there.
The Kolos Throk component can be found somewhere in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should find the component.
You have found the missing component
You have completed the Kolos Throk, one of four keys to enter the locked door to Roz Dagalur.
The Kolos Throk socket can be found in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should take the component there.
You hear an unlocking sound from behind the wall

You stumble across a strange seal bearing a mark of famine, the seal of Kolos Throk. How it was placed here remains a mystery. It seems this stone seal was once set in something. Perhaps an answer lies in the Dead City of Minas Morgul.
You have completed the Kolos Throk.
The Kolos Throk socket can be found somewhere in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should take the seal there.
A strange seal bearing the mark of famine points towards the Dead City of Minas Morgul.
